title: United Airlines Bike Fees are no more – another airline where bikes fly for less
content:
United Airlines bike fees are a thing of the past. Well, the oversized fee that is. This move puts the airline – the third largest in the world by some measurements – in the company of Delta and American Airlines, both of which phased out their bicycle fees in 2019. According to United, bicycles

The post United Airlines Bike Fees are no more – another airline where bikes fly for less appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew Marshall
